Package AI

Class AutomaticRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • AI.AutomaticRobot
  • public class AutomaticRobot
extends java.lang.Object
    An automatic robot which plays the game with the "Play" offline server. Can be "loaded" with different algorithms, and provides the exact interface required by the "Play" offline server.
    Author:
    Ofek Bader

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AutomaticRobot​(RobotAlgorithm algorithm)
      [Constructor]
      Create a new robot with the specified algorithm strategy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      AutomaticRobot clone()
      Clone this robot and its algorithm.
      double getOrientation()
      get the next move of this robot for the next step of the game.
      Point3D getStartingPlayerPosition()
      Get the first starting point/position of the robot for the player initialization of "Play".
      void setNewGameStatus​(Game game)
      Update/refresh the game status - notify the robot about game changes.
